meanings.definition: Occurring or published twice a month.
meanings.sent1: The semimonthlies meetings always fell on the first and third Fridays.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy receiving my semimonthlies paycheck, as it helps me budget better.
meanings.sent3: The semimonthlies bus schedule was so predictable that even the pigeons knew when to arrive.
meanings.sent4: Her semimonthlies visits to the park brought a sense of rhythm to her otherwise chaotic life.
meanings.sent5: The semimonthlies lunar cycle fascinated the young astronomer.

meanings.definition: Publications that are issued twice a month.
meanings.sent1: I subscribed to two semimonthlies, one for recipes and one for gardening tips.
meanings.sent2: The library carries a variety of semimonthlies, from fashion magazines to scientific journals.
meanings.sent3: The semimonthlies newspaper had a section dedicated to funny cat videos.
meanings.sent4: Her love for semimonthlies stemmed from the joy of receiving new content every two weeks.
meanings.sent5: The semimonthlies comic book series kept readers eagerly awaiting the next installment.
